response.message:
Awesome! This is definitely going to be useful!

One small thing - you might want to put a key for the different vote abbreviations. Example:

dn:10 cl:10 op:8 of:3 fv:10 up:13

It took me a while to figure out that the labels are down, close, open, offensive, favorite, and up respectively.
...and I still don't know what "8" means in this context. The only two posts that had a value for "8" that I could find both had bounties attached, but that's hardly conclusive.
Whoa... There's some scary stuff on that there "new posts by new users" list.
Let's hope those involved in the "Great Edits Wars" do not have 10k rep.

So what is the point of giving high rep users more statistics?   
More powers I can understand, including the ability to immediately hide offensive questions or block all posts of a new user. But I don't see why the extra stats need to be limited to the trustees

"Let’s hope those involved in the “Great Edits Wars” do not have 10k rep."

Hmm, there are no new tools per say, just new views.. they can still do the same things so i don't get this.

And some people in TGEW had 10k rep
@Olafur Waage: Never let facts stand in the way of a good argument.
@George Some people are running around this place with a packet of matches just looking to start a fire.
quick question: is that > 10,000 or >= 10,000? ( I guess is the first )

So the reputation whores will be running the place.  Figures.

How is anyone supposed to take this thing seriously?
I guess it's not supposed to be taken seriously. Anyway I'm just waiting for crap to take over.
